compliant.section: Notice of Information Collected and Used ... identifiers, personal information listed in the California Customer Records statute, commercial information, Internet and similar network activity information, geolocation information, visual and audio information that you upload to the Services, professional or employment-related information, and account access credentials.
compliant.legal provisions: Right of access, Right to be informed

compliant.section: Right to Know Requests ... You may have a right to request (i) the categories and specific pieces of personal information about you that we have collected, (ii) the categories of sources from which such information was collected, (iii) the business or commercial purposes for which such information was collected and (iv) the categories of third parties with which such information is disclosed and the business purposes for such disclosure.
compliant.legal provisions: Right of access, Right to be informed, Right to restriction of processing

compliant.section: Right to Delete Requests ... You may have a right to request that we delete personal information we maintain about you.
compliant.legal provisions: Right to erasure ('right to be forgotten')

compliant.section: Right to Correct Requests ... You may have a right to request that we correct inaccurate personal information we maintain about you.

non_compliant.section: This section applies if you are a resident of the State of California, Colorado or another U.S. state that has passed a privacy law similar to the California Consumer Privacy Act (“CCPA”) and requires specific privacy notice disclosures.
non_compliant.amend: The GDPR has extraterritorial applicability, meaning it applies to organizations based outside the EU if they process personal data of individuals in the EU.  The policy should not limit its application based on the user's residency.

non_compliant.section: We only use and disclose sensitive personal information for the purposes specified in the CCPA or otherwise in line with your consent.
non_compliant.legal provisions: Principles relating to the processing of special categories of personal data
non_compliant.amend: The GDPR sets a higher bar for processing sensitive personal data, requiring explicit consent or another specific legal basis.  Merely aligning with CCPA is insufficient.

non_compliant.section: We may disclose your personal information as described in this Privacy Notice under the heading "How We Share Your Information," but we do not "sell" or "share" your personal information, as those terms are defined in the CCPA and similar U.S. state privacy laws, nor have we done so in the preceding 12 months.
non_compliant.amend: The GDPR restricts transfers of personal data outside the EU, requiring adequacy decisions, appropriate safeguards, or derogations.  The policy should address international data transfers and ensure compliance with GDPR requirements.
